# PunchClock

> Free browser-based time clock for freelancers. Clock in, clock out, export to CSV. No signup, no account, no bloat.

## What is PunchClock?

PunchClock is a dead-simple time tracking tool for freelancers and solo workers. It runs entirely in your browser â€” no account needed, no data leaves your machine.

## Features

- One-click clock in / clock out
- Live elapsed timer while working
- Daily and weekly hours summary
- Optional note per time entry
- CSV export of all entries
- All data stored in browser localStorage
